msg: Enable configuration of some Cocoon sitemap components, e.g. output html encoding and document type declaration for html and xhtml serializers, JTidy properties file location for html generator.

author: xavier
msg: fix style: change methods signature to reduce number of parameters, avoiding to pass around information which can be accessed easily from instance variables.
